attributes.action: House all British and commonwealth veterans before any afghan refugees
attributes.additional_details: Our service men and women go above and beyond to protect our nation and our nation’s interests overseas just to be let down time and time again by our government now councils are saying they will house afghan refugees the Home Secretary has also stated that afghan refugees will be aloud to enter the UK without passports while our nations bravest are left to rot
attributes.background: House anyone who has served in the British armed forces before any migrant or refugee

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585941
